comment.author: 38936533@N06
comment._content: This specific aircraft was transferred from the USAAF as a C-54D Skymaster (ex-USAAF 42-72728) to the Marines as a Douglas R5D-3.

comment.author: 54902021@N02
comment._content:
to straighten it up a bit you might have also said it this was
R5D-3 Douglas (C-54D Skymaster ex-USAAF 42-72728)   PC(4)  USMC  KW
